name: Radiant Spark Swarm
description: The Radiant Spark Swarm is a glowing collection of magical sparks, known for its swift movements and affinity for magic. It hovers and flies effortlessly.
memorable: Its ability to target and attack magical items makes the swarm a dangerous foe in magic-rich environments.
goals: To seek out and disrupt creatures possessing magical items.
relations: Often encountered alongside other elemental creatures.
environment: Commonly found in areas with high concentrations of magic.
strengths: Immunity to fire, poison, and radiant damage; resistant to common physical damage types.
weaknesses: Low hit points and poor Strength score make it vulnerable to crowd control tactics.
attacks: The swarm attacks with radiant sparks that deal significant radiant and fire damage in close-range combat.
most_powerful_ability: Drawn to Magic allows it to detect and prioritize magical items within 60 feet.
additional_information: Emits bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
Can occupy the space of other creatures due to its swarm nature.
Cannot regain or gain temporary hit points.
Targets the most rare magical item if multiple are present.
Inflicts damage to those who come into contact with it.

magical swarm seeking out enchanted items
swarm that attacks magical item users
